purposeDescriptions.low: allows target wild creatures to communicate with the caster for a short time
purposeDescriptions.mid: allows target wild creatures to communicate and cooperate with the caster until they wish to return to the wild
purposeDescriptions.high: allows target wild creatures to psychically communicate and cooperate with the caster until they wish to return to the wild
purposeDescriptions.invMid: insults and slights target wild creatures, inciting anger
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: causes extreme fury and bloodlust in target wild creatures
